protocol.24h: Total fees paid by users when using the protocol in the last 24 hours
protocol.7d: Total fees paid by users when using the protocol in the last 7 days
protocol.30d: Total fees paid by users when using the protocol in the last 30 days
protocol.1y: Total fees paid by users when using the protocol in the last 12 months
protocol.monthlyAverage1y: Average monthly fees paid by users in the last 12 months
protocol.cumulative: Total fees paid by users since the protocol was launched
protocol.annualized: Total fees paid by users when using the protocol in the last 30 days, multiplied by 12 to annualize it
protocol.change7dover7d: Change of last 7d fees over the previous 7d fees
protocol.change30dover30d: Change of last 30d fees over the previous 30d fees
protocol.average1y: Average monthly fees paid by users in the last 12 months

chain.24h: Total fees paid by users when using the chain in the last 24 hours. Updates daily at 00:00 UTC
chain.7d: Total fees paid by users when using the chain in the last 7 days. Updates daily at 00:00 UTC
chain.30d: Total fees paid by users when using the chain in the last 30 days. Updates daily at 00:00 UTC

protocol.24h: Total Revenue earned by the protocol in the last 24 hours
protocol.7d: Total Revenue earned by the protocol in the last 7 days
protocol.30d: Total Revenue earned by the protocol in the last 30 days
protocol.1y: Total Revenue earned by the protocol in the last 12 months
protocol.monthlyAverage1y: Average monthly revenue earned by the protocol in the last 12 months
protocol.cumulative: Total Revenue earned by the protocol since the protocol was launched
protocol.annualized: Total Revenue earned by the protocol in the last 30 days, multiplied by 12 to annualize it
protocol.change7dover7d: Change of last 7d revenue over the previous 7d revenue
protocol.change30dover30d: Change of last 30d revenue over the previous 30d revenue
protocol.average1y: Average monthly revenue earned by the protocol in the last 12 months

chain.24h: Subset of fees that the chain collects for itself in the last 24 hours. Updates daily at 00:00 UTC
chain.7d: Subset of fees that the chain collects for itself in the last 7 days. Updates daily at 00:00 UTC
chain.30d: Subset of fees that the chain collects for itself in the last 30 days. Updates daily at 00:00 UTC

chain.24h: Total fees paid by users when using the apps on the chain in the last 24 hours. Excludes stablecoins, liquid staking apps, and gas fees. Updates daily at 00:00 UTC
chain.7d: Total fees paid by users when using the apps on the chain in the last 7 days. Excludes stablecoins, liquid staking apps, and gas fees. Updates daily at 00:00 UTC
chain.30d: Total fees paid by users when using the apps on the chain in the last 30 days. Excludes stablecoins, liquid staking apps, and gas fees. Updates daily at 00:00 UTC

chain.24h: Total revenue earned by the apps on the chain in the last 24 hours. Excludes stablecoins, liquid staking apps, and gas fees. Updates daily at 00:00 UTC
chain.7d: Total revenue earned by the apps on the chain in the last 7 days. Excludes stablecoins, liquid staking apps, and gas fees. Updates daily at 00:00 UTC
chain.30d: Total revenue earned by the apps on the chain in the last 30 days. Excludes stablecoins, liquid staking apps, and gas fees. Updates daily at 00:00 UTC

protocol.24h: Total revenue earned by token holders of the protocol in the last 24 hours
protocol.7d: Total revenue earned by token holders of the protocol in the last 7 days
protocol.30d: Total revenue earned by token holders of the protocol in the last 30 days
protocol.1y: Total revenue earned by token holders of the protocol in the last 12 months
protocol.monthlyAverage1y: Average monthly revenue earned by token holders of the protocol in the last 12 months
protocol.cumulative: Total revenue earned by token holders of the protocol since the protocol was launched
protocol.annualized: Total revenue earned by token holders of the protocol in the last 30 days, multiplied by 12 to annualize it
protocol.change1d: Day-over-day percentage change in revenue earned by token holders of the protocol
protocol.change7d: Week-over-week percentage change in revenue earned by token holders of the protocol
protocol.change1m: Month-over-month percentage change in revenue earned by token holders of the protocol
protocol.change7dover7d: Change of last 7d revenue earned by token holders of the protocol over the previous 7d revenue earned by token holders of the protocol
protocol.change30dover30d: Change of last 30d revenue earned by token holders of the protocol over the previous 30d revenue earned by token holders of the protocol
protocol.average1y: Average monthly revenue earned by token holders of the protocol in the last 12 months

chain.24h: Total revenue earned by token holders of the protocols on the chain in the last 24 hours. Updates daily at 00:00 UTC
chain.7d: Total revenue earned by token holders of the protocols on the chain in the last 7 days. Updates daily at 00:00 UTC
chain.30d: Total revenue earned by token holders of the protocols on the chain in the last 30 days. Updates daily at 00:00 UTC

chain.24h: Real Economic Value (Chain Fees + MEV Tips) of the chain in the last 24 hours. Updates daily at 00:00 UTC
chain.7d: Real Economic Value (Chain Fees + MEV Tips) of the chain in the last 7 days. Updates daily at 00:00 UTC
chain.30d: Real Economic Value (Chain Fees + MEV Tips) of the chain in the last 30 days. Updates daily at 00:00 UTC

protocol.24h: Net protocol earnings (Revenue - Incentives) by the protocol in the last 24 hours
protocol.7d: Net protocol earnings (Revenue - Incentives) by the protocol in the last 7 days
protocol.30d: Net protocol earnings (Revenue - Incentives) by the protocol in the last 30 days
protocol.1y: Net protocol earnings (Revenue - Incentives) by the protocol in the last 12 months
protocol.monthlyAverage1y: Average monthly net protocol earnings by the protocol in the last 12 months
protocol.cumulative: Total net protocol earnings by the protocol since it was launched
protocol.annualized: Total net protocol earnings by the protocol in the last 30 days, multiplied by 12 to annualize it
protocol.change1d: Day-over-day percentage change in net protocol earnings by the protocol
protocol.change7d: Week-over-week percentage change in net protocol earnings by the protocol
protocol.change1m: Month-over-month percentage change in net protocol earnings by the protocol
protocol.change7dover7d: Change of last 7d net protocol earnings by the protocol over the previous 7d net protocol earnings by the protocol
protocol.change30dover30d: Change of last 30d net protocol earnings by the protocol over the previous 30d net protocol earnings by the protocol
protocol.average1y: Average monthly net protocol earnings by the protocol in the last 12 months

chain.24h: Net protocol earnings (Revenue - Incentives) by the protocols on the chain in the last 24 hours. Incentives are split propotionally to revenue on this chain. Updates daily at 00:00 UTC
chain.7d: Net protocol earnings (Revenue - Incentives) by the protocols on the chain in the last 7 days. Incentives are split propotionally to revenue on this chain. Updates daily at 00:00 UTC
chain.30d: Net protocol earnings (Revenue - Incentives) by the protocols on the chain in the last 30 days. Incentives are split propotionally to revenue on this chain. Updates daily at 00:00 UTC

protocol.24h: Total incentives distributed to users in the last 24 hours through liquidity mining or incentive programs
protocol.7d: Total incentives distributed to users in the last 7 days through liquidity mining or incentive programs
protocol.30d: Total incentives distributed to users in the last 30 days through liquidity mining or incentive programs
protocol.1y: Total incentives distributed to users in the last 12 months through liquidity mining or incentive programs
protocol.monthlyAverage1y: Average monthly incentives distributed to users in the last 12 months
protocol.cumulative: Total incentives distributed to users since the protocol was launched
